original: intros. intros Hlimf Hlimg Hex. unfold Lim, ex_Rbar_minus in *. unfold Lim_seq in Hlimf, Hlimg. destruct Hlimf as [lf Hlimf]. destruct Hlimg as [lg Hlimg]. unfold ex_Rbar_plus in Hex. destruct Hex as [l Hplus]. apply is_lim_unique in Hlimf. apply is_lim_unique in Hlimg. apply is_lim_unique in Hplus.
